languages.text: {n}Война с моторными вандалами потребовала немало ресурсов и усилий, поставки между несколькими аркологиями были нарушены рейдами возмездия, а часть населения вымерла от голода или техногенных накладок. Но ничто не могло остановить блюстителей.{/n}

{n}The war with the Engine Vandals took a lot of resources and effort, and supply chains between several arcologies were disrupted by the reprisal raids. Some of the populace has died of starvation or due to technical failures. Nothing, however, could stop the enforcers.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Война с моторными вандалами потребовала немало ресурсов и усилий, поставки между несколькими аркологиями были нарушены рейдами возмездия, а часть населения вымерла от голода или техногенных накладок. Но ничто не могло остановить блюстителей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The war with the Engine Vandals took a lot of resources and effort, the supply chains between several arcologies were disrupted by the retribution raids, and some of the populace has died of starvation or due to technogenetic mishaps But nothing could stop the Enforcers.{/n}

{n}The war with the Engine Vandals took a lot of resources and effort, the supply chains between several arcologies were disrupted by the retribution raids, and some of the populace has died of starvation or due to technogenetic mishaps But nothing could stop the Enforcers.{/n}

{n}The war with the Engine Vandals took a lot of resources and effort, and supply chains between several arcologies were disrupted by the reprisal raids. Some of the populace has died of starvation or due to technical failures. Nothing, however, could stop the enforcers.{/n}

{n}The war with the Engine Vandals took a lot of resources and effort, and supply chains between several arcologies were disrupted by the reprisal raids. Some of the populace has died of starvation or due to technogenetic difficulties. The enforcers, however, could be stopped by nothing.{/n}

{n}The war with the Engine Vandals took a lot of resources and effort, and supply chains between several arcologies were disrupted by the reprisal raids. Some of the populace has died of starvation or due to technogenetic difficulties. The enforcers, however, could be stopped by nothing.{/n}

{n}The war with the Engine Vandals took a lot of resources and effort, and supply chains between several arcologies were disrupted by the reprisal raids. Some of the populace has died of starvation or due to technical failures. Nothing, however, could stop the enforcers.{/n}

{n}The war with the Engine Vandals took a lot of resources and effort, and supply chains between several arcologies were disrupted by the reprisal raids. Some of the populace has died of starvation or due to technical failures. Nothing, however, could stop the enforcers.{/n}

{n}The war with the Engine Vandals took a lot of resources and effort, and supply chains between several arcologies were disrupted by the reprisal raids. Some of the populace has died of starvation or due to technical failures. Nothing, however, could stop the enforcers.{/n}

languages.text: {n}行商浪人与引擎破坏者之间爆发了战争，这场战争耗费了大量资源与人力，多个巢都之间的供应链都遭到了报复性袭击，部分民众死于饥荒或技术故障。然而，没有任何代价可以阻止执法者的脚步。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The war with the Engine Vandals took a lot of resources and effort, and supply chains between several arcologies were disrupted by the reprisal raids. Some of the populace has died of starvation or due to technical failures. Nothing, however, could stop the enforcers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}行商浪人与引擎破坏者之间爆发了战争，这场战争耗费了大量资源与人力，多个巢都之间的供应链都遭到了报复性袭击，部分民众死于饥荒或技术故障。然而，没有任何代价可以阻止执法者的脚步。{/n}
{n}行商浪人与引擎破坏者之间爆发了战争，这场战争耗费了大量资源与人力，多个巢都之间的供应链都遭到了报复性袭击，部分民众死于饥荒或技术问题。然而，没有任何代价可以阻止执法者的脚步。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La guerra con los Vándalos del Motor requirió muchos recursos y esfuerzos, y las cadenas de suministro entre varias arcologías se vieron interrumpidas por las incursiones de represalia. Parte de la población ha muerto de hambre o debido a dificultades técnicas. Sin embargo, nada pudo detener a los guardias.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The war with the Engine Vandals took a lot of resources and effort, and supply chains between several arcologies were disrupted by the reprisal raids. Some of the populace has died of starvation or due to technical failures. Nothing, however, could stop the enforcers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La guerra con los Vándalos del Motor requirió muchos recursos y esfuerzos, y las cadenas de suministro entre varias arcologías se vieron interrumpidas por las incursiones de represalia. Parte de la población ha muerto de hambre o debido a dificultades técnicas. Sin embargo, nada pudo detener a los guardias.{/n}

languages.text: {n}エンジン破壊者との戦争には多くの資源と労力が費やされ、複数のアークロジー間の供給網は報復による奇襲で寸断されていた。住人の一部は餓死したり、技術的な故障で死んだりした。しかし、エンフォーサーを止められるものは何もなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The war with the Engine Vandals took a lot of resources and effort, and supply chains between several arcologies were disrupted by the reprisal raids. Some of the populace has died of starvation or due to technical failures. Nothing, however, could stop the enforcers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}エンジン破壊者との戦争には多くの資源と労力が費やされ、複数のアークロジー間の供給網は報復による奇襲で寸断されていた。住人の一部は餓死したり、技術的な問題で死んだりした。しかし、エンフォーサーを止められるものは何もなかった。{/n}
{n}エンジン破壊者との戦争には多くの資源と労力が費やされ、複数のアークロジー間の供給網は報復による奇襲で寸断されていた。住人の一部は餓死したり、技術的な問題で死んだりした。しかし、エンフォーサーを止められるものは何もなかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La guerre contre les Vandales mécaniques nécessite bien des ressources et des efforts, et les chaînes d'approvisionnement entre plusieurs arcologies sont coupées par des raids de représailles. Certains habitants meurent de faim ou suite à des difficultés techniques. En revanche, rien ne peut arrêter les prévôts.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The war with the Engine Vandals took a lot of resources and effort, and supply chains between several arcologies were disrupted by the reprisal raids. Some of the populace has died of starvation or due to technical failures. Nothing, however, could stop the enforcers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La guerre contre les Vandales mécaniques nécessite bien des ressources et des efforts, et les chaînes d'approvisionnement entre plusieurs arcologies sont coupées par des raids de représailles. Certains habitants meurent de faim ou suite à des difficultés techniques. En revanche, rien ne peut arrêter les prévôts.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Krieg mit den Maschinenvandalen kostete viele Ressourcen und Mühen, und die Lieferketten zwischen verschiedenen Arkologien wurden durch die Vergeltungsüberfälle gestört. Ein Teil der Bevölkerung ist verhungert oder durch technisches Versagen gestorben. Die Enforcer konnte allerdings nichts aufhalten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The war with the Engine Vandals took a lot of resources and effort, and supply chains between several arcologies were disrupted by the reprisal raids. Some of the populace has died of starvation or due to technical failures. Nothing, however, could stop the enforcers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Krieg mit den Maschinenvandalen kostete viele Ressourcen und Mühen, und die Lieferketten zwischen verschiedenen Arkologien wurden durch die Vergeltungsüberfälle gestört. Ein Teil der Bevölkerung ist verhungert oder durch technisches Versagen gestorben. Die Enforcer konnte allerdings nichts aufhalten.{/n}

{n}Der Krieg mit den Maschinenvandalen kostete viele Ressourcen und Mühen, und die Lieferketten zwischen verschiedenen Arkologien wurden durch die Vergeltungsüberfälle gestört. Ein Teil der Bevölkerung ist verhungert oder aufgrund technogenetischer Schwierigkeiten gestorben. Die Enforcers aber waren durch nichts aufzuhalten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Makine Vandalları ile yapılan savaş, bir hayli kaynağa ve kuvvete mal oldu. Pek çok arkoloji arasında yer alan tedarik zincirleri ise misilleme baskınlarıyla kesintiye uğradı. Nüfusun bir kısmı, ya açlıktan ya da teknolojik başarısızlıklar neticesinde can verdi. Ancak infazcıların yoluna kimse taş koyamadı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The war with the Engine Vandals took a lot of resources and effort, and supply chains between several arcologies were disrupted by the reprisal raids. Some of the populace has died of starvation or due to technical failures. Nothing, however, could stop the enforcers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Makine Vandalları ile yapılan savaş, bir hayli kaynağa ve kuvvete mal oldu. Pek çok arkoloji arasında yer alan tedarik zincirleri ise misilleme baskınlarıyla kesintiye uğradı. Nüfusun bir kısmı, ya açlıktan ya da teknolojik başarısızlıklar neticesinde can verdi. Ancak infazcıların yoluna kimse taş koyamadı.{/n}
